lines: at 3m, we discover and innovate in nearly every industry to help solve problems around the world.

easily applied to a variety of surfaces; conformable and can be painted or applied over painted surfaces
acrylic adhesive adheres to a wide variety of substrates and retains a constant level of adhesion over time, yet removes easily when necessary
